Text:
they already did. I just wish they go upgrade to using x264/mp4 instead of the outdated xvid/avi/mp3 format.

1.  It encodes faster! Use CRF at 25 and for maximum compatibility use the Baseline Profile.
2. Much smaller size means no more cropping the picture.
3. Works on ipods and most everything else.

What I'll do is post each week after it is done in x264 for those who want to archive.
